FuncDef: This commands creates a time of day override policy for a given policer. Up to 8 overrides can be configured per policer. Rate/mbs/cbs/flow-rate/flow-count configured in each override-id will override the default policer values at the specified time of day configured in the override.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the time of day override ID. Values-1 to 255.
Keyword used to create the time of day override policy.
